text:
Honoring country's biggest stars!

The 2017 CMT Artists of the Year celebration took place at the Schermerhorn Symphony Center in Nashville on Wednesday night, and some of Music City's most beloved stars stepped out for the big occasion.

SEE ALSO: ELLE's Women in Hollywood 2017: Red carpet arrivals

The night belonged to the honorees, who were Chris Stapleton, Keith Urban, Jason Aldean, Luke Bryan and Florida Georgia Line -- the First Men of country music.

On the red carpet, every one of them was all smiles posing alongside their significant others, and we couldn't get enough of the stunning couples.

It was Urban and wife Nicole Kidman who totally stole the show, though, as they adorably cuddled as they rocked the red carpet. The country crooner opted for a cool all-black look with his shirt sexily unbuttoned, while Kidman was radiant in a pink velvet dress and silver heels.

SEE ALSO: TIDAL X: Brooklyn: Beyoncé, Cardi B and more stun on the red carpet

Other stars in attendance were the Backstreet Boys, Common, Danielle Bradbery and Andra Day, among others.

See the CMT Artists of the Year red carpet arrivals below:
